name: Principal Sir!
greetingText: We extend our sincerest gratitude for your unwavering support.
wishText: May success and prosperity always accompany you!
text1: We are immensely grateful for your guidance.
textInChatBox: Thank you for always being there for us.
outroText: We hope this message conveys our heartfelt appreciation.
replayText: Or click, if you want to read it again.
